title: Don’t miss out on a one-year Costco Gold Star Membership and a Digital Costco Shop Card for $60
content:
Macworld

Making a budget last can be difficult whether you’re shopping for yourself or restocking the pantry for the whole family. Bulk shopping is one way to try cutting costs, and you can also cut down on errand trips if you get it all done in one place. The economical choice might be getting a Costco One-Year Gold Star Membership for $60 also gets you a $30 Digital Costco Shop Card*. 

Shop at Costco for food, home goods, and more 

Whether you’re shopping for tonight or purchasing groceries to last through the month, Costco may be the place to do it. With more than 500 warehouses across the United States, there might be a one-stop shopping location near you. Stop by a Costco Warehouse to look for great prices on produce, fresh baked goods, electronics, and more. If your kitchen needs an upgrade, take a look at Kirkland Signature™ cookware. Put your $30 Digital Costco Shop Card* toward your purchase online or in a Costco warehouse. 

Get more errands done under one roof. Some Costco warehouses also have a pharmacy if you need to pick up a prescription. And while you wait, visit the Costco Tire Center to get brand-name tires on your vehicle. Don’t forget to fill your car with gasoline at the Costco Gas Station on your way home. 

A Costco Membership even gives you the chance to make low-cost travel plans. Check online for travel deals before booking your next flight. 

Get a Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership for $60 and get a $30 Digital Costco Shop Card*. 

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + a $30 Digital Costco Shop Card – $60

See Deal

Prices subject to change.

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

Entertainment
